content.html: Hi Carol, I've had a word with Adrian, and he's really pumped about the idea, says we should get it live asap. I've reassured him it'll be live by cop Tues. He also asked if we can also do newly learned numbers as well? Along with a map with a blue reset button. Told him np.
content.value:
Hi Carol,

I've had a word with Adrian, and he's really pumped about the idea, says we should get it live asap. I've reassured him it'll be live by cop Tues.

He also asked if we can also do newly learned numbers as well? Along with a map with a blue reset button. Told him np.
